scripts.deploy-dev: npm run prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ georgeciubotaru/amplify-dev --access-token ${GRAPH_TOKEN}
scripts.deploy:mumbai: npm run prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ amplify-labs/amplify-stage --access-token ${GRAPH_TOKEN}
scripts.deploy:velastest: npm run prepare:velastest && graph deploy --node http://graph-node.ampt.tech:8020/ --ipfs http://graph-node.ampt.tech:5001/ amplify-labs/amplify-velas-test
